title: [Self-Directed] Cognitive Psychology-Based Project Design for Corporate E-Learning Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and secondary-level language education experience
context.additional_context: Project implementation for developing language education e-learning policies in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of e-learning content design based on multimodal learning theory
Learners can develop language education activity projects optimized for mobile environments
Learners can develop and validate learning assessment tools applying cognitive load theory
Learners can prepare practical recommendations for revising corporate e-learning policies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
